nodes.text: Karric Soik was a male Miraluka Jedi who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Around 3643 BBY, he resided on Dromund Kaas when he was killed by an Imperial-affiliated individual.

Karric Soik appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Dromund Kaas. He is not directly involved in any quests, however he can be killed by any Imperial character for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
